/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in a palette of mostly beige and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive backdrop. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
